description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              • Vision:
              
              There are a lot of website and Smartphone apps on the word and you are also one of user and have benefits from this system.
              
              Moreover, internet services on Website and Smartphone has changed our life as well.
              
              Besides to provide our service in Vietnamese market, Groot has a big plan to expand to Asia market. We believe about the young people in Vietnam who can present Groot services to the world by the strength and innovation of the youth.
              
              Would you want to join with us to create the new Web service?
              
              We are looking for the human resource in Vietnam and build a strong relationship. It is an opportunity for you to have more experience website services by teamwork. Then you have a chance to be a leader or Project Manager.
              

              - Mainly develop Front-end of Web service by HTML, CSS, JavaScript;
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              Age: 20 - 30 years old.
              
              Working time: 8h00 – 17:00
              
              High priority for people who have the experience of development web app, can work long term, have career passion, and not changing jobs so many times.
              

              + Required skill:
              
              Must have experience of Front-end of Website by HTML, CSS, JavaScript
              

              + Non-required skills/ advantage skills: (Advantage)
              
              Have experience of PHP development
              
              Have experience of Back-end such as Windows, Linux, have over 3 years experience of web app development by PHP or Ruby
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
phuc-loi:
Các Phúc Lợi Dành Cho Bạn
             








                Once time in a year
